name: Real estate deal analysis and underwriting (single-family + small multifamily)
intent: Provide a minimal, executable capability for: Real estate deal analysis and underwriting (single-family + small multifamily).
triggers: User needs help designing or improving real estate deal analysis and underwriting
User needs a decision rubric, workflow, templates, or telemetry for this domain
User lacks a specialist team and needs a minimum viable operating model
anti_triggers: User requests illegal, unsafe, or unethical actions
User requests professional legal/tax/medical advice beyond general information
